{"url":"https://www.urbanearlyedu.org","name":"Urban Early College Network","description":"
Urban Early College Network students have the opportunity to experience academic success combined with cognitive, emotional and social development. We set high standards, incorporating innovative programs, parental involvement, and a safe and caring environment. We are built on a holistic philosophy that emphasizes a positive sense of self and a concept of moral and purposeful living. This highly structured, disciplined environment cultivates leaders who are well-rounded and productive citizens.","image":"//static1.squarespace.com/static/5b61a6964611a0dc47f49673/t/5b61b4d06d2a730eadede6bc/1585231919551/","@context":"http://schema.org","@type":"WebSite"}

sqs-gallery-block-show-meta
sqs-gallery-block-meta-only-title
block-animation-none clear

div.p: Urban Early College Network students have the opportunity to experience academic success combined with cognitive, emotional and social development. We set high standards, incorporating innovative programs, parental involvement, and a safe and caring environment. We are built on a holistic philosophy that emphasizes a positive sense of self and a concept of moral and purposeful living. This highly structured, disciplined environment cultivates leaders who are well-rounded and productive citizens.

div.p: Come in for a tour of our building, or give us a call at 937-952-1079, weekdays between 7:30 am and 3 pm. We can't wait to see you!
